layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  LayoutView at (0,0) size 800x600
layer at (0,0) size 800x99
  LayoutBlockFlow {HTML} at (0,0) size 800x99
    LayoutBlockFlow {BODY} at (8,16) size 784x67
      LayoutBlockFlow {P} at (0,0) size 784x30 [color=#0000FF] [border: (10px double #0000FF) none]
        LayoutText {#text} at (0,10) size 376x19
          text run at (0,10) width 376: "This paragraph should have two blue lines directly above it."
      LayoutBlockFlow {P} at (0,46) size 784x21 [color=#0000FF] [border: (1px solid #0000FF) none]
        LayoutText {#text} at (0,1) size 422x19
          text run at (0,1) width 422: "This paragraph should have a single thin blue line directly above it."
